From: "dcoburn" <dcoburn@...>

::Hakibuscon::

	Hakibuscon is going super fast now, faster than ever before, to try and
help the Maximal base.  Just as he got to the point where he could see the
battle, but they couldn't see him, he remembered that he had no handheld
weapons.  But then he also remebered, he did have built in body weapons! 
His optical lasers were there, except they weren't very good for combat
like this.  But, his finger mini-missiles would do just fine!  His scanners
showed that the bot attacking the base was called Scattershot.  His
scanners also showed two Maximals named Firearm and Rex trying to defend
the base.  Hakibuscon transformed, ran over and shot 3 finger missiles at
Scattershot and then ran over to Rex and Firearm.

	"Look, don't ask any questions!  I am not a Maximal, I am not a Predacon
and I'm not part of the Alliance.  I am only trying to be a part of this
war, so I decided to help you out by saving your base.  This doesn't mean I
am a Maximal though!" Hakibuscon said quickly under his breath.
